articles.content: CHENNAI, June 18 (Reuters) - Shares of companies controlled by Indian billionaire Gautam Adani recorded their biggest weekly losses ever. The six stocks cumulatively lost 1.91 trillion Indian rupees … [+3626 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Ferrari, Amazon's AWS enter agreement on data - Reuters
articles.description: Ferrari (RACE.MI) and Amazon Web Services (AWS) have entered an agreement to make Amazon's (AMZN.O) cloud computing unit the luxury carmaker's cloud storage, machine learning, and artificial intelligence provider, AWS said on Friday.

articles.title: Streaming reaches new milestone - Axios
articles.description: This is a big deal for streaming media.
articles.content:
Nielsen on Thursday introduced a new metric for measuring how many people watch streaming video and for how long.
